title: Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Convenient Lodging for Wofford vs. Tennessee Tech Game
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Convenient Lodging for Wofford vs. Tennessee Tech Game Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers convenient lodging for the Wofford College vs. Tennessee Tech football game on September 12, 2015. We look forward to welcoming fans attending the Wofford and Tennessee Tech football game. SPARTANBURG, SC, September 04,   Football fans attending the Wofford College and Tennessee Tech game in Spartanburg on September 12 will find convenient lodging at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. Kick off time will be 7pm at Wofford's Gibbs Stadium. This is a non-conference game. Tickets are $20 for adults and $10 for youth ages 3-12. Halftime will feature the King BMX Stunt Show. "We look forward to welcoming fans attending the Wofford and Tennessee Tech football game," notes Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "Our Spartanburg SC hotel is located just minutes from the Wofford stadium," explains Ms. Allison. The award winning Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is a leading choice among hotels in Spartanburg , South Carolina. Guests will enjoy comfortable accommodations with microwave, mini refrigerator, and Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . All rooms feature free high speed Internet. Travelers can grab a freshly baked cookie at check in, and then relax and unwind at the fitness center or outdoor pool. Property amenities include a business center and guest laundry. Hampton's On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is complimentary. On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekday mornings. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. This Spartanburg South Carolina hotel is located off I-85 at Exit 78. Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package. HHonors members can earn triple points on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday nights through December 31, 2015. AAA, military, and senior discounts are available. For information and tickets to the Wofford College and Tennessee Tech football game, visit www.wofford.edu . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85, call (864) 577-9080 or visit online at www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional. For more information visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
